profile.longDescription:
Merhaba, ben Emir👋

28 yaşındayım ve İstanbul'da yaşıyorum.  10+ yıl Efabrika, Düğün.com, Teknasyon gibi şirketlerde yazılım geliştirici olarak çalışmış ve sonrasında Moneo Yazılım A.Ş., Kodilan.com ve Kommunity, Inc.'e seri girişmiş bir CEO'yum.

Superpeer'da şu konularda konuşabiliriz:
- Nereden başlamalıyım,
- Yazılım sektörü ve kariyer tavsiyeleri,
- Topluluk yönetimi ve fiziksel/online etkinlik düzenleme,
- Açık kaynak, Backend / DevOps,
- PHP,
- Test kültürü ve sürdürülebilir back-end mimarileri,
- Side-project geliştirme,
- Türkiye'de şirket kurma,
- ABD'de şirket kurma,
- Uzaktan çalışma,
- İş geliştirme,

ya da gelin sadece tanışalım😍

Selamlar, ben Beril. Tasarımcıyım. Yaklaşık 7 senedir Startuplara UX/UI ve Design Thinking üzerine danışmanlık veriyorum. Şu anda Viveka'da Startuplar için UX ve Viveka'nın çatısı altında Product design desteği sağlıyorum. Buradaki gelirimin tamamını İzmir'de depremden etkilenenlere ulaştırılması için AKUT Derneğine bağışlayacağım. Gereksiz detay; İzmirliyim Ankara'da yaşıyorum.

I worked both as Developer and as Operations during my career. I also worked as a CTO in an amazon.com investment. I have been into several DevOps Transition projects during last decade.

I can give you concrete technical advises regarding Dev-side of DevOps and Ops-side of DevOps.  

I will donate all income to AKUT (For the victims of the recent earthquake in Izmir)

Hi there 👋
My name is Selçuk. I am CTO at MonoFor, Inc.

I’m currently working on;

MonoSign - Identity and Access Management 🔐
MonoPam - Privileged Access Management 👮‍
MonoSync - Enterprise Service Bus 📑
Monotp - 2FA / Push Authenticator App 🔴
MonoConfig - Central Config Management for Applications ⚙️
MonoSay - Intelligent 🤖 Bot Platform
MonoPush - Instance Push Notifications for Telegram
As you can see, I'm a product man! 😎

🌱 I love to learn!
💬 Ask me about anything related to my job.
📫 How to reach me on linkedin.com/in/selcukermaya
⚡ Fun fact: I'm a developer has no name!
You can also reach me from Twitter @selcukermaya or from my Personal Website.

Want you more 😬 ?

I have developed lots of web, mobile, and desktop applications for 10+ years. I always try to choose the best language and technology for what I do. It is also a joy for me to read and search for new and best technologies for my job. Teaching is one of my hobbies. I believe "teaching is the best way to learn and to help society.". I believe that being open-minded is a must in my job. As a matter of fact, I am trying to help Open Source Projects too.

I know how to ask questions to my best teacher Google. Therefore, learning has been always a piece of cake for me and I love cakes very much 😇

I have a YouTube channel that and I share things there http://youtube.com/selcukermaya

Merhaba ben Giray,

İstanbul'da yaşıyorum, başarılı ürünler tasarlamayı ve geliştirmeyi seviyorum. Şu anda PARAM'da Kullanıcı Deneyimi Müdürü olarak çalışıyorum. PARAM markasının uçtan uca tüm Müşteri ve Kullanıcı deneyimi tasarımlarından sorumluyum. 

Daha önce Vodafone, Ziraat Bankası, THY, AnadoluJet, Al-Tayer, Edenred, Decathlon firmalarına ürünler geliştirdim.

Benimle konuşabileceğiniz konular;

*UX Design
*UX Management
*UX Strategy
*UI Design
*Design System
*UX Career Management

Bunların dışında da aklınıza gelen her konuda görüşebiliriz :)

Helloooo, my name is Serbay from Istanbul. I am working in digital marketing like 14 years. I have consulted to more than 200 different companies including startups to big brands both in Turkey and internationally. Currently managing director in digital marketing agency and co-founder of content marketing agency. Also digital
Marketing lecturer in Kadir has and Boğaziçi university. Love to help you for your digital
Marketing questions. Let’s start.

Hi!

I've been coding for more than ten years and have worked in different international companies and projects, including big and small iOS and back-end apps. I've worked with a lot of multicultural teams both on-site and remotely. I helped to build high-performing teams, hire the best people suitable for the job. I hold many job interviews.

We can talk about:
🤜🏽   iOS app development and releases
🤜🏽   Software architecture
🤜🏽   Best practices of software development
🤜🏽   Team communication
🤜🏽   Remote work and written communication
🤜🏽   Giving and receiving feedback
🤜🏽   Soft skills of software engineers
🤜🏽   Career choices and planning
🤜🏽   CV preparation and review
🤜🏽   Moving to another country and living as an ex-pat
🤜🏽   Problems at work and how to approach them
🤜🏽   How to increase productivity
🤜🏽   Cultural differences and their effects on the work

I can also watch your presentation, read your technical or non-technical writing. We can work together, and I can give you constructive feedback.

I donate all the money from the "Quick Talk" and "Chat (Accessible)" sessions to either TEGV - Educational Volunteers Foundation of Turkey or LOSEV - The Foundation for Children with Leukemia in Turkey.


Book a call with the links below!👇🏽

Oktay, yanlızca çok eski arkadaşlarım "Okti" der.

2009'dan beri tasarım sektöründeyim. Şimdilerde Product Designer olarak çalışıyorum. Sektörel anlamda en büyük ilgi duyduğum konu developer ve tasarımcıları bir arada ahenk içinde çalışırken görmek. Bu sebeple Design System ve yazılımcı/tasarımcı ilişkilerini pek önemsiyorum. Gelin beraber konuşalım.

Bozuk şeyleri söküp tamir edenlere de yardım edebilirim. Çünkü maker olmak bunu gerektirir. Bunun yanında raspberry ve arduino ise konu çözeriz.

🇺🇸 in English:
I’m Okti or Oktay,

I’m a product designer and maker.

Mostly I’m working on design systems and want to help lots of designers and developers.

Besides, I play with hype toys like Arduino and raspberry.

If you are wanted to become a designer. I can help you.

Another professional designer who wants to make some noise. Who ready for chit-chat 🐿

I'm a Product Manager, Founder of gingain.com. 

Fintech, E-commerce, Education, Gambling, Real-estate domains are in my professional area.

You could get a call about:

+ Create a product from 0 to 1.  (let's call MVP)
+ MVP Development 
+ Product Strategy
+ UX Research
+ UX Design
+ Wireframe
+ UX Copywriting
+ KPIs & Metrics Measurement
+ Pitch Deck
+ Public Speaking

Software Engineer @Trendyol, Co-Founder of Scode and MSP at Microsoft. Mostly working on Distributed Systems, Edtech, E-Commerce, and Fintech Solutions

• Skilled experience in tech startups and software development
• Knowledge in Education Technology and E-Commerce (mostly Checkout & Payment business process)
• Remarkable experience in Open Source technologies (.NET Core, Spring Boot, React, React Native and more)
• Well understanding of object-oriented development, Design Patterns & Practices.
• Expertise in development practices such as refactoring, pair programming (Ping Pong and Mob Techniques) TDD (Test Driven Development)
• Experience in working with agile development teams and processes.
• Ability to work in a cross-functional team.
• Strong understanding of the software development cycle.
• Knowledge in design, development, release cycle, and delivering software products to market.
• Ability to mentor and coach others.
• Speaking English and Turkish.
• Having communication, time management, and problem-solving skills.
• Ability to work in PCI compliance environment, with knowledge about writing secure code and making code review in terms of security. 

More details about me: https://www.linkedin.com/in/peacecwz/

Ferdi is an all self-taught and award-winning designer who specialized in ui/ux design and art direction, born in Istanbul, Turkey.

Private lessons are available in Turkish and English.

Merhaba, ben Erhan.

Yazılım geliştirme benim için bir meslekten çok öte, aslında bir yaşam şekli. Bu zamana kadar bir çok farklı proje ve mimarilerde uygulama geliştirim. Sizinle de superpeer'da aşağıdaki konular üzerine konuşabiliriz:

- Go programlama dili
- Wordpress ve Woocommerce
- Mikroservis mimariler
- Clean code tasarımlar
- Yazılım Best Practice'leri
- Açık kaynak proje geliştirme.

Software Architect olarak çalışan Azmi Mengü, profesyonel kariyerinde Backend ve Cloud mimarilerini tasarlamak ve geliştirmek üzerine yoğunlaşmıştır. Mikro servisler, dağıtık mimari yapılar ve SQL, NoSQL veritabanı sistemleri üzerinde uzmanlığı bulunmaktadır. 2015'ten bu yana AWS üzerinde cloud çözümleri tasarlayıp geliştiren Azmi Mengü; Serverless Cloud teknolojisi üzerinde de çalışmalarda bulunmuş, bunların canlı ortamlara adaptasyonunu sağlamış ve çeşitli topluluklara katkıda bulunmuştur. Türkiye'nin en büyük Serverless topluluğu olan, Cloud and Serverless Turkey'de organizatör ve konuşmacı olarak yer almaktadır. Yaptığı çalışma ve katkılar sebebiyle AWS tarafından, AWS Community Builder olarak tanınmıştır.

7 yıldır Android uygulama geliştirir, arayüz ve animasyonları sever. Open source katkı sağlar, bazen blog yazar, bolca düşünür.

https://twitter.com/kotlinist

Konuşabileceğimiz konular;
- Android Architecture Components
- View, Canvas, Bitmap ve Matrixler
- Android mülakatlarına hazırlanma

Merhaba, ben Fatih!

İstanbul'da yaşayan, yazılım seven bir yazılım geliştiriciyim. Toolio'da full-stack geliştirici olarak çalışıyorum. Modern JavaScript adında bir kitap yazdım. jstanbul topluluğunun da kurucularındanım. GitHub'da açık kaynak geliştiriyorum. (github.com/f). Superpeer'da birlikte şu konularda konuşabiliriz:

- Yazılım ve Front-end Kariyer Tavsiyeleri,
- Açık kaynak yazılım,
- JavaScript,
- Vue.js
- Sürdürülebilir front-end mimarileri,
- Atomik tasarım,
- Uzaktan çalışma,
ya da istediğiniz herhangi başka bir konu.
profile.shortDescription: JavaScript Developer, Open Source Enthusiast, Community Organizer, Author.
AWS, DevOps, Serverless, Community Builder, SaaS Marketing, Developer Marketing
profile.longDescription:
AWS, DevOps, Serverless, SaaS ürünler için developer marketing, content marketing & strategy, konferanslarda konuşmaya başlama, teknik içerik geliştirme, konferans düzenleme, topluluk oluşturma ve yönetme üzerine sohbet edebiliriz. 
Social media: twitter.com/srhtcn
LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/serhatcan/
A Turkish family guy. Software Engineer. Minimalist. #microservices #softwaredesign #dotnetcore - http://medium.com/@suadev

* LibreOffice core developer with the primary language of C++
* Collabora Online developer and community mentor
* Retired translator
* Former Pardus developer
* Contributor to various Free and Open Source Software projects including GNOME, KDE, systemd etc.
* Member of GNOME Foundation, The Document Foundation (TDF), and Linux Users Accocisation of Turkey (LKD)
* Serving as part of the Membership Committee of TDF
* Currently coordinating multiple local communities and user groups including LibreOffice Türkiye and GNOME Türkiye
* Frequently runs workshops and attends conferences and other FLOSS events as speaker
* Mentoring university students in the Google Summer of Code program since 2017
* Happy to chat about Open Source development, communities & ecosystem

profile.shortDescription: Product strategy, large-scale crawling, content marketing, building agency, SEO.
profile.longDescription:
I was a high school student when I meet with SEO by creating the first Turkish SEO blog. Then, it turns to be an agency with three offices, and we're working with 60+ talented people. Until today, we have worked with 500+ clients from 10+ countries. (Zeo Agency - zeo.org)

Now, I'm leading a product team to create the world's first data-science backed SEO analytics software, seo.do. As a non-technical product manager, I made many mistakes and learned great lessons to share.

If you are starting a new SEO campaign or trying to build a new product (specifically analytics software), I will be happy to contribute to your journey with my experiences.

All the earnings from Superpeer will be donated to the victims of the earthquake in Izmir, my hometown. 

Thank you to all Superpeer team to make this happen!

Merhaba, ben Cavide 👋

2013 yılından beri dijital pazarlama sektöründe hizmet veriyorum.

Aşağıdaki konularda konuşabiliriz ya da tanışabiliriz:

- Dönüşüm optimizasyonu; siteye gelen trafikten daha fazla dönüşüm elde etme,
- UX yorumlama,
- Google Optimize, VWO, Firebase
- A/B testing
